===Etymology===
''From'' [[不老]] ([[ふろう]], [[furō]]), (''forever young'') + [[不死]] ([[ふし]], [[fushi]]), (''never die'')

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ふろうふし}}

# forever young, perpetual youth and longevity.
